title: Money Trouble is Hurting Our Marriage
description:
Since moving into a more expensive neighborhood, Tyson says he is struggling financially and with his marriage. - Dr. Laura: "Work as a team to resolve problems you've both created."

Are finances one of the things you and your spouse argue about? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
